description.zh-cn: 位于欧洲东北部的共和国，是波罗的海三国之一。首都为维尔纽斯。现为欧盟、北约等国际组织的成员国。
description.en: A republic in Northeastern Europe, one of the three Baltic states. Its capital is Vilnius. It is a member of international organizations such as the European Union and NATO.

description.zh-cn: 立陶宛政治人物，2019年当选为立陶宛总统。
description.en: A Lithuanian politician who was elected President of Lithuania in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 立陶宛政治人物，在2020年议会选举后被任命为总理。
description.en: A Lithuanian politician appointed as Prime Minister following the 2020 parliamentary election.

nodes.id: 绍柳斯·斯克韦尔内利斯

zh-cn: 绍柳斯·斯克韦尔内利斯
萨利乌斯·思科威尔内里

description.zh-cn: 立陶宛政治人物，曾任立陶宛总理，现任立陶宛议会议长。
description.en: A Lithuanian politician who previously served as the Prime Minister of Lithuania and currently serves as the Speaker of the Seimas.

description.zh-cn: 立陶宛共和国的立法机关。
description.en: The legislative branch of the Republic of Lithuania.

description.zh-cn: 统一立陶宛并接受加冕的首位国王，建立了立陶宛王国。
description.en: The first King of Lithuania, who united the country and was crowned, establishing the Kingdom of Lithuania.

description.zh-cn: 由明道加斯于1253年建立的王国，是立陶宛国家的早期形式。
description.en: A kingdom established by Mindaugas in 1253, an early form of the Lithuanian state.

description.zh-cn: 中世纪晚期至近代早期的欧洲国家，14世纪时曾是欧洲领土最大的国家。
description.en: A European state from the late Middle Ages to the early modern period, which was the largest country in Europe in the 14th century.

description.zh-cn: 由波兰王国和立陶宛大公国组成的共主邦联，是17至18世纪欧洲最大、人口最多的国家之一。
description.en: A dualistic state of Poland and Lithuania, one of the largest and most populous countries of 17th- and 18th-century Europe.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪末期，俄罗斯、普鲁士和奥地利三国对波兰立陶宛联邦领土进行的三次瓜分，最终导致联邦灭亡。
description.en: Three partitions of the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth that took place towards the end of the 18th century and ended the existence of the state, carried out by the Russian Empire, the Kingdom of Prussia, and Habsburg Austria.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪至20世纪初存在的帝国，参与了对波兰立陶宛联邦的瓜分，并长期统治立陶宛地区。
description.en: An empire that existed from the 18th to the early 20th century, participated in the partitions of the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth, and ruled over the Lithuanian territory for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪的社会主义国家，在第二次世界大战期间占领并吞并了立陶宛，直至1990年立陶宛宣布恢复独立。
description.en: A socialist state in the 20th century that occupied and annexed Lithuania during World War II until Lithuania declared its restored independence in 1990.

nodes.id: 苏联占领波罗的海国家

zh-cn: 苏联占领波罗的海国家

description.zh-cn: 苏联在1940年至1991年间对波罗的海三国（立陶宛、拉脱维亚、爱沙尼亚）的军事占领和吞并。
description.en: The military occupation and annexation of the three Baltic states (Lithuania, Latvia, and Estonia) by the Soviet Union from 1940 to 1991.

description.zh-cn: 1918年2月16日由立陶宛国民大会签署的文件，宣布立陶宛恢复独立。
description.en: The document signed by the Council of Lithuania on February 16, 1918, declaring the restoration of an independent Lithuania.

en: Act of the Re-Establishment of the State of Lithuania

description.zh-cn: 1990年3月11日由立陶宛最高委员会签署的法案，宣布恢复立陶宛的独立国家地位，使其成为第一个脱离苏联的加盟共和国。
description.en: The act signed on March 11, 1990, by the Supreme Council of Lithuania, declaring the restoration of Lithuania's independent statehood, making it the first Soviet republic to break away.

description.zh-cn: 在1944年至1953年间为反抗苏联占领而进行武装斗争的立陶宛抵抗组织。
description.en: Lithuanian resistance fighters who waged a guerrilla war against the Soviet occupation from 1944 to 1953.

description.zh-cn: 一场由立陶宛、拉脱维亚和爱沙尼亚三国约200万民众手牵手组成的和平示威活动，抗议苏联占领并争取独立。
description.en: A peaceful political demonstration where approximately two million people from Lithuania, Latvia, and Estonia joined hands to protest the Soviet occupation and seek independence.

description.zh-cn: 1991年1月，苏联军队试图武力推翻宣布独立的立陶宛政府，导致平民伤亡的事件。
description.en: In January 1991, Soviet military forces attempted to overthrow the newly independent Lithuanian government by force, resulting in civilian casualties.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家。因立陶宛与台湾发展关系，两国关系恶化。
description.en: A country in East Asia. Relations with Lithuania deteriorated after Lithuania developed closer ties with Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，通称台湾。2021年与立陶宛发展了更紧密的外交和经济关系。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as Taiwan. Developed closer diplomatic and economic relations with Lithuania in 2021.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲的政治和经济联盟，立陶宛于2004年5月1日加入。
description.en: A political and economic union in Europe, which Lithuania joined on May 1, 2004.

description.zh-cn: 北美和欧洲国家之间的军事联盟，立陶宛于2004年3月29日加入。
description.en: A military alliance between North American and European countries, which Lithuania joined on March 29, 2004.

description.zh-cn: 1933年至1945年间的德国。第二次世界大战期间占领立陶宛，并在此地进行了犹太人大屠杀。
description.en: Germany between 1933 and 1945. Occupied Lithuania during World War II and carried out the Holocaust there.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，纳粹德国及其合作者在立陶宛境内对犹太人进行的种族灭绝行动，导致该国绝大多数犹太人被杀害。
description.en: The genocide of Jews in Lithuania during World War II by Nazi Germany and its collaborators, which resulted in the murder of the vast majority of the country's Jewish population.

description.zh-cn: 一个族教群体。二战前在立陶宛拥有庞大的社群，但在大屠杀中几乎被完全摧毁。
description.en: An ethnoreligious group. They had a large community in Lithuania before World War II but were almost entirely destroyed during the Holocaust.

description.zh-cn: 1569年波兰王国和立陶宛大公国签署的条约，建立了波兰立陶宛联邦。
description.en: An act signed in 1569 by the Kingdom of Poland and the Grand Duchy of Lithuania that created the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth.

description.zh-cn: 北欧岛国，是第一个承认立陶宛在1990年恢复独立的国家。
description.en: A Nordic island country, the first to recognize Lithuania's restored independence in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 吉塔纳斯·瑙塞达于2019年上任成为立陶宛总统。
description.en: Gitanas Nausėda took office as the President of Lithuania in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 在2020年立陶宛议会选举后，因格丽达·希莫尼特上任成为总理。
description.en: Following the 2020 Lithuanian parliamentary election, Ingrida Šimonytė took office as Prime Minister.

relationships.source: 绍柳斯·斯克韦尔内利斯

description.zh-cn: 绍柳斯·斯克韦尔内利斯于2024年上任成为立陶宛议会议长。
description.en: Saulius Skvernelis took office as the Speaker of the Seimas in 2024.

description.zh-cn: 明道加斯统一了立陶宛，并于1253年接受加冕，建立了立陶宛王国。
description.en: Mindaugas united Lithuania and was crowned in 1253, establishing the Kingdom of Lithuania.

description.zh-cn: 《卢布林联合》的签署确立了波兰立陶宛联邦的建立。
description.en: The signing of the Union of Lublin established the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯、普鲁士及奥地利对波兰立陶宛联邦的三次瓜分，最终导致联邦于1795年灭亡。
description.en: The three partitions of the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth by Russia, Prussia, and Austria led to the final demise of the state in 1795.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国参与了对波兰立陶宛联邦的瓜分，吞并了其大部分领土。
description.en: The Russian Empire participated in the partitions of the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth, annexing most of its territory.

description.zh-cn: 该法案的签署宣告了现代立陶宛共和国的独立。
description.en: The signing of this act declared the independence of the modern Republic of Lithuania.

relationships.source: 苏联占领波罗的海国家

description.zh-cn: 苏联于1940年占领并吞并立陶宛，中断了其独立国家的地位，直至1990年立陶宛宣布恢复独立。
description.en: The Soviet Union occupied and annexed Lithuania in 1940, interrupting its status as an independent state until Lithuania declared its restored independence in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 该法案的签署宣告了立陶宛脱离苏联，恢复独立国家地位。
description.en: The signing of this act declared Lithuania's secession from the Soviet Union and the restoration of its independent statehood.

description.zh-cn: 作为一场大规模的反苏和平示威，“波罗的海之路”极大地推动了立陶宛恢复独立的进程。
description.en: As a massive anti-Soviet peaceful demonstration, the Baltic Way significantly pushed forward the process of restoring Lithuania's independence.

description.zh-cn: 立陶宛游击队为反抗苏联的占领而进行了长达近十年的武装斗争。
description.en: The Lithuanian partisans waged an armed struggle against the Soviet occupation for nearly a decade.

description.zh-cn: 苏联军队试图通过军事行动推翻新独立的立陶宛政府，但未能成功。
description.en: Soviet military forces attempted to overthrow the newly independent government of Lithuania through military action, but failed.

description.zh-cn: 冰岛是第一个承认立陶宛于1990年恢复独立的国家，为立陶宛的独立提供了国际支持。
description.en: Iceland was the first country to recognize Lithuania's restored independence in 1990, providing international support for its independence.

description.zh-cn: 立陶宛于2004年5月1日正式成为欧洲联盟的成员国。
description.en: Lithuania officially became a member state of the European Union on May 1, 2004.

description.zh-cn: 立陶宛于2004年3月29日正式加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: Lithuania officially joined the North Atlantic Treaty Organization on March 29, 2004.

description.zh-cn: 自2021年起，由于立陶宛采取“亲台疏中”政策，包括允许设立驻立陶宛台湾代表处和认定新疆存在种族灭绝，两国关系急剧恶化。
description.en: Since 2021, due to Lithuania's 'pro-Taiwan, distant-from-China' policy, including allowing the establishment of the Taiwanese Representative Office and recognizing the genocide in Xinjiang, relations between the two countries have deteriorated sharply.

description.zh-cn: 自2021年起，立陶宛与台湾的关系显著增进，包括互赠防疫物资以及互设代表处。
description.en: Since 2021, relations between Lithuania and Taiwan have significantly improved, including mutual donations of anti-pandemic supplies and the establishment of representative offices.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战德国占领期间，纳粹德国及其合作者在立陶宛境内系统性地屠杀犹太人。
description.en: During the German occupation in World War II, Nazi Germany and its collaborators systematically murdered Jews within Lithuania.

description.zh-cn: 立陶宛犹太人大屠杀导致该国91%至95%的犹太人遇害。
description.en: The Holocaust in Lithuania resulted in the murder of 91% to 95% of the country's Jewish population.
